text: leonard_hofstadter On the other hand , some physicists are concerned that if the super collider actually works , it will create a black hole and swallow up the Earth ending life as we know it .
raj_koothrappali Psh , what a bunch of crybabies . No guts , no glory man .
leonard_hofstadter Hey , check it out , the school of pharmacology is looking for volunteers .
raj_koothrappali We are testing a new medication for social anxiety , panic attacks , agoraphobia and obsessive compulsive disorder . Why would they be looking for test subjects here ?
leonard_hofstadter I do n't know , Raj . Maybe the comic book store does n't have a bulletin board . What 's going on ?
howard_wolowitz Shhh ! Hot girl in Sheldon 's office .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon 's office ? Is she lost ?
howard_wolowitz Do n't think so . I followed her here from the parking lot .
leonard_hofstadter Maybe she 's his lawyer .
howard_wolowitz Well she 's free to examine my briefs .
leonard_hofstadter Howard ... .
howard_wolowitz I know , I 'm disgusting , I should be punished . By her , oh look , I did it again .
girl Well , that should do it .
sheldon_cooper Thank you for coming by . Hello .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , hey buddy .
sheldon_cooper Buddy .
howard_wolowitz Sorry I 'm late , I 'm working on a project that may take me up on the next space shuttle .
sheldon_cooper How can you be late , I was n't expecting you at all .
howard_wolowitz Nobody ever expects me , sometimes you just look and ... BAM ! Howard Wolowitz .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , are you going to introduce us ?
sheldon_cooper Oh , alright , this is Missy , Missy this is Leonard and Rajesh and you 've already met Howard .
missy_cooper It 's nice to meet you .
leonard_hofstadter You too , swell , also .
howard_wolowitz Yeah .
leonard_hofstadter So , how do you two know each other .
missy_cooper Oh , he once spent nine months with my legs wrapped around his head .
leonard_hofstadter Excuse me ?
sheldon_cooper She 's my twin sister , she thinks she 's funny but frankly I 've never been able to see it .
missy_cooper It 's because you have no measurable sense of humor , Shelly .
sheldon_cooper How exactly would one measure a sense of humor ? A humormometer ?
howard_wolowitz Well , I think you 're delightfully droll . Or as the French say , tres drole .
missy_cooper Okay , so let me see if I got this . Leonard , Howard and ... I 'm sorry what was your name again .
sheldon_cooper Rajesh .
leonard_hofstadter So Missy , what brings you all the way from Texas ?
howard_wolowitz Was it perhaps destiny , I think it was destiny .
missy_cooper My friend 's getting married in Disneyland tomorrow night .
howard_wolowitz Destiny , thy name is Anaheim .
missy_cooper And I had to drop off some papers for Shelly to sign for my dad 's estate .
sheldon_cooper The papers could have been mailed , Mom just sent you here to spy on me , did n't she .
missy_cooper I guess that 's why they call you a genius .
sheldon_cooper They call me a genius because I 'm a genius . Tell Mom that I currently weigh 165 pounds , and that I 'm having regular bowel movements . Enjoy the wedding , goodbye .
howard_wolowitz@leonard_hofstadter Woah , woah .
leonard_hofstadter If the wedding 's not until tomorrow , why do n't you stay with us tonight ?
missy_cooper Oh , I do n't think so . Shelly does n't like company . Even as a little boy he 'd send his imaginary friends home at the end of the day .
sheldon_cooper They were not friends , they were imaginary colleagues .
leonard_hofstadter Look , you 're here , we have plenty of room .
sheldon_cooper No we do n't .
howard_wolowitz Come on , Shelly , she 's family .
sheldon_cooper So what ? I do n't issue invitations to your mother .
missy_cooper Well it would be nice not to have to drive out to Anaheim in rush hour .
sheldon_cooper And do n't ever call me Shelly .
leonard_hofstadter So it 's settled . You 'll stay with us .
howard_wolowitz I 'll walk you to your car . You 're in structure 3 level C , right ?
sheldon_cooper What just happened ?
missy_cooper So anyway , we 're eight years old , and Sheldon converts my easy - bake oven to some kind of high - powered furnace .
leonard_hofstadter Hee - hee , just classic .
sheldon_cooper I needed a place to fire ceramic semi - conductor substrates for home - made integrated circuits .
missy_cooper He was trying to build some kind of armed robot to keep me out of his room .
sheldon_cooper Made necessary by her insistence on going into my room .
missy_cooper Anyway , I go to make those little corn muffins they give you , there 's a big flash , next thing you know my eyebrows are gone .
howard_wolowitz Ha - ha , not your eyebrows ?
missy_cooper Yep . I had to go through the entire second grade with crooked eyebrows my Mom drew on .
sheldon_cooper Is that what that was ? I just assumed that the second grade curriculum had rendered you quizzical .
penny Hey , Leonard , you left your underwear in the dryer downstairs .
leonard_hofstadter Those are not mine .
penny Really , they have your little name label in them .

leonard_hofstadter Yeah , no , I do , I use those ... uh ... just to polish up my ... spear - fishing equipment . I spear fish . When I 'm not crossbow hunting , I spear fish . Uh , Penny , this is Sheldon 's twin sister , Missy . Missy , this is our neighbor Penny .
missy_cooper Hi .
penny Wow , you do n't look that much alike .
howard_wolowitz Can I get a hallelujah .
sheldon_cooper Fraternal twins come from two separate eggs , they are no more alike than any other siblings .
howard_wolowitz Hallelujah .
raj_koothrappali Hey , guess what . I 've been accepted as a test subject for a new miracle drug to overcome pathological shyness .
penny Hey , good for you , Raj .
raj_koothrappali Yes , I 'm very hopeful . Hello Missy . They mentioned there may be side effects .
raj_koothrappali So , Missy . Have you ever met a man from the exotic subcontinent of India ?
missy_cooper Well , there 's Dr Patel at our church .
raj_koothrappali Ah yes , Dr Patel , good man .
howard_wolowitz Do you like motorcycles , 'cos I ride a hog .
raj_koothrappali A hog ? You have a two cylinder scooter with a basket on the front .
howard_wolowitz You still have to wear a helmet .
raj_koothrappali Have you ever heard of the Kama Sutra ?
missy_cooper The sex book ?
raj_koothrappali The Indian sex book . In other words if you wonder wonder who wrote the book of love , it was us .
penny Hey , Sheldon 's sister 's pretty cute , I w ... .
leonard_hofstadter I was n't staring !
penny I did n't say you were , I just said she was cute .
leonard_hofstadter Oh . Huh , um , maybe , if you like women who are tall ... and perfect .
penny Sheldon , why are you ignoring your sister ?
sheldon_cooper I 'm not ignoring my sister . I 'm ignoring all of you .
leonard_hofstadter I brought snacks .
missy_cooper Oh my ! Gherkins and ... .
leonard_hofstadter Onion dip , it 's onion dip .
missy_cooper Oh .
leonard_hofstadter We do n't entertain much .
raj_koothrappali Missy , do you enjoy pajamas ?
missy_cooper I guess .
raj_koothrappali We Indians invented them . You 're welcome .
howard_wolowitz Yeah , well my people invented circumcision . You 're welcome !
penny Missy , I 'm going to go get my nails done . Do you want to come ?
missy_cooper God yes . Thanks .
penny You 're welcome .
missy_cooper Bye guys .
howard_wolowitz Bye Missy .
leonard_hofstadter Bye Missy , see you .
penny Goodbye Leonard !
leonard_hofstadter Uh , yeah , no , uh , bye Penny .
howard_wolowitz Okay , you two have to back off .
raj_koothrappali Why should I back off , you back off dude .
leonard_hofstadter Excuse me , this is my apartment and she 's my roommate 's sister .
howard_wolowitz So what , you 've already got Penny .
leonard_hofstadter How do I have Penny ? In what universe do I have Penny ?
howard_wolowitz So I can have Penny ?
leonard_hofstadter Hell , no !
sheldon_cooper Excuse me , can I interject something . I 'm ordering pizza online , is everyone okay with pepperoni ?
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , can I talk to you in private ?
sheldon_cooper I guess . Do n't worry , I was going to order you cheeseless .
leonard_hofstadter Thank you .
sheldon_cooper That 's okay . Lactose intolerance is nothing to be embarrassed about .
howard_wolowitz I 'm a fancy Indian man , we invented pajamas !
raj_koothrappali Hey , look at me , I do n't have a foreskin .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , are you aware that your sister is an incredibly attractive woman ?

sheldon_cooper Hmmm ? She certainly has the symmetry and low body fat that western culture deems desirable . It 's noteworth that at other points in history , heavier women were the standard for beauty because their girth suggested affluence .
leonard_hofstadter That 's fascinating , but I ... .
sheldon_cooper I did n't say it was fascinating , I said it was noteworthy .
leonard_hofstadter Alright , noted . But my point is that Koothrappali and Wolowitz ... they 're hitting on your sister .
sheldon_cooper Oh . Okay . You know , I do n't want to criticise your rhetorical style but , we 'd be a lot further along in this conversation if you 'd begun with that thought .
leonard_hofstadter That 's great , but I ... .
sheldon_cooper What I 'm saying is that we took quite an unnecessary detour from what I now understand to be your thesis .
leonard_hofstadter Whatever . You have to do something about it .
sheldon_cooper Why ?
leonard_hofstadter Because she 's your sister .
sheldon_cooper I do n't understand . Yes , we shared a uterus for nine months , but since then we 've pretty much gone our own separate ways .
leonard_hofstadter Okay , uh ... oh , consider this . With your father gone , it is your responsibility to make sure that Missy chooses a suitable mate .
sheldon_cooper I had n't considered that . We do share DNA .
leonard_hofstadter Uh - huh .
sheldon_cooper So there is the possibility , however remote , that resting in her loins is the potential for another individual as remarkable as myself .
leonard_hofstadter Exactly . And , you owe it to yourself and to posterity to protect the genetic integrity of your sister 's future offspring .
sheldon_cooper You 're right . If someone wants to get at Missy 's fallopian tubes , they 'll have to go through me .
raj_koothrappali I am Shiva the destroyer , I will have the woman !
howard_wolowitz I 'm warning you , I was judo champion at math camp .
sheldon_cooper Alright , that 's enough juvenile squabbling , stop it , stop it I say . I 'm going to settle this right now . Neither of you are good enough for my sister .
howard_wolowitz Who are you to decide that ?
leonard_hofstadter He 's the man of his family , you have to respect his wishes .
sheldon_cooper You 're out too , by the way .
leonard_hofstadter Say what ?
sheldon_cooper It 's nothing personal , I 'd just prefer if my future niece or nephew did n't become flatulent every time they eat an Eskimo pie .
howard_wolowitz What are you so happy about ?
raj_koothrappali I 'm not happy , it 's the medication , I ca n't stop smiling .
sheldon_cooper Now that Leonard 's made me aware of how high the genetic stakes are , we have to face the fact that none of you are suitable mates for my sister .
howard_wolowitz Wait a minute . Leonard made you aware of that ?
leonard_hofstadter We all make mistakes , let 's move on .
raj_koothrappali Excuse me , but I think you 're missing a big opportunity here .
sheldon_cooper How so ?
raj_koothrappali Everybody knows genetic diversity produces the strongest offspring . Why not put a little mocha in the family latte .
sheldon_cooper In principle you have a point , but as a practical matter , need I remind you that it takes experimental pharmaceuticals to simply enable you to speak to the opposite sex .
raj_koothrappali I think you 're focussing entirely too much on the drugs .
howard_wolowitz Is it 'cause I 'm Jewish , 'cause I 'd kill my Rabbi with a porkchop to be with your sister .
sheldon_cooper This has nothing to do with religion . This has to do with the fact that you 're a tiny , tiny man who still lives with his mother .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , you are really being unreasonable .
sheldon_cooper Am I ? Here . Eat this cheese without farting and you can sleep with my sister .
missy_cooper Oh really ?
sheldon_cooper Oops .
missy_cooper Shelly , can I speak to you for a minute ? Alone ?
sheldon_cooper Why does everyone suddenly want to talk to me alone ? Usually nobody wants to be alone with me .
leonard_hofstadter We all make mistakes , let 's move on .
missy_cooper Okay . I 'm not even going to ask why you 're pimping me out for cheese . But since when do you care at all about who I sleep with ?
sheldon_cooper Truthfully , I 've never given it any thought , but it has been pointed out to me that you carry DNA of great potential .
missy_cooper What on earth are you talking about ?
sheldon_cooper Let me explain . You see , I 'm a superior genetic mutation , an improvement on the existing mediocre stock .
missy_cooper And what do you mean , mediocre stock ?
sheldon_cooper That would be you . But residing within you is the potential for another me . Perhaps even taller , smarter and less prone to freckling , a Sheldon 2.0 if you will .
missy_cooper Sheldon 2.0 ?
sheldon_cooper Exactly . Now , I am not saying that I should be the sole decider of who you mate with . If you 're not attracted to the suitor then the likelihood of conception would be reduced .
missy_cooper You have got to be kidding me !
sheldon_cooper Not at all . Frequent coitus dramatically increases the odds of fertiliziation .
missy_cooper Okay Shelly , sit down . Now I 've lived my whole life dealing with the fact that my twin brother is , as Mom puts it , one of God 's special little people .

sheldon_cooper I always thought I was more like a cuckoo bird . You know , a superior creature whose egg is placed in the nest of ordinary birds . Of course the newly hatched cuckoo eats all the food , leaving the ordinary siblings to starve to death . Luckily for you , that 's where the metaphor ended .

missy_cooper I thought it ended at cuckoo . Now you listen to me , if you want to start acting like a brother who cares about me , then terrific . Bring it on . But you try one time to tell me who I should be sleeping with , and you and I are going to go round and round the way we did when we were little . Remember ?
sheldon_cooper I have an alternate proposal .
missy_cooper Go on .
sheldon_cooper You donate eggs . We will place them in cryogenic storage . I will find an appropriate sperm donor for your eggs , have them fertilized and implanted in you , that way everybody wins .
sheldon_cooper Correction . Missy can date whoever she wants .
howard_wolowitz Look , we have to settle this .
leonard_hofstadter I agree . Sheldon 's sister is hiding at Penny 's because we 've all been hitting on her at the same time .
raj_koothrappali She 's not hiding . She needed privacy to call her grandmother who 's apparently very sick . Oh , and then I believe she has to wash her hair .
howard_wolowitz Oh , you poor , deluded bastard .
raj_koothrappali Do n't start with me dude .
howard_wolowitz You want to go again ? Let 's go .
leonard_hofstadter Sit down .
howard_wolowitz Okay .
leonard_hofstadter If we 're going to fight over Missy , let 's do it the right way . The honorable way .
leonard_hofstadter And he 's down !
howard_wolowitz Come on , come on , get up .
leonard_hofstadter Stay down , bitch . Yeah , ha ha , natural selection at work .
sheldon_cooper I weep for humanity .
leonard_hofstadter Excuse me while I go tell Missy the good news .
penny Ah , hey Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Hi Penny , how 's it going . Listen , that guy Mike that you were dating , is that still going on ?
penny Uh , pretty much , why ?
leonard_hofstadter Nothing , just catching up . By the way , may I speak to Missy please ?
penny Of course .
missy_cooper Hi , Leonard , what 's up ?
leonard_hofstadter Well , since you 're leaving tomorrow I was wondering if you 'd like to go out to dinner with me ?
missy_cooper That 's so sweet . But no thanks .
leonard_hofstadter Oh . You have other plans , or ... ?
missy_cooper No .
leonard_hofstadter Oh . Alright uh ... enjoy the rest of your evening .
missy_cooper Thanks . See you .
leonard_hofstadter Um , here 's something we did n't anticipate .
penny What do you want , Howard ?
howard_wolowitz I 'm fine , thanks for asking . I 've come to call on Missy .
penny Missy ?
missy_cooper Hi Howard .
howard_wolowitz The amazing Howard . Do you like magic ?
missy_cooper Not really . No .
howard_wolowitz Then you are in for a treat . Behold , an ordinary cane . Da - dah !
missy_cooper No .
howard_wolowitz Okay .
penny Missy ?
raj_koothrappali Thank you . I apprec ... apprec ... appreeee ... oh - oh .
penny Oh , honey , is your medication wearing off ?
missy_cooper Oh , hi , cutie pie . I was hoping you 'd show up .
missy_cooper We had a dog who made a noise like that . Had to put him down .
missy_cooper Any news you want me to pass along to Mom ?
sheldon_cooper Well , she might be interested to know that I have refocused my research from bosonic string theory to heteronic string theory .
missy_cooper Yeah , I 'll just tell her you said hey .
sheldon_cooper Okay , well , it was pleasant seeing you , other than that business with my testicles .
missy_cooper Come on , Shelly . I want you to know I 'm very proud of you .
sheldon_cooper Really ?
missy_cooper Yup , I 'm always bragging to my friends about my brother the rocket scientist .
sheldon_cooper You tell people I 'm a rocket scientist ?
missy_cooper Well yeah .
sheldon_cooper I 'm a theoretical physicist .
missy_cooper What 's the difference ?
sheldon_cooper What 's the difference ?
missy_cooper Goodbye Shelly .
sheldon_cooper My God ! Why do n't you just tell them I 'm a toll taker at the Golden Gate Bridge ? Rocket scientist , how humiliating .
